thread.section_title: Carpeteria Carpet One, San Diego Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carpeteria Carpet One, San Diego | www.carpeteriacarpetone.com
thread.title: David Courson
thread.title_full: Carpeteria Carpet One, San Diego reviewed by David Courson

author: David Courson
title: David Courson
text: From the start to the finish I was impressed and our expectations exceeded with Carpet One! John Medina was very helpful, answered all my questions, and assisted us with the best carpet for our home. I really liked the extra steps they take in clean up and spraying a microbial before the new carpet was installed. Our family is very happy with the new carpet, the installation process and I really like the warranty. I would recommend Carpet One to any other options based on their product options, service and warranty!
